title: Khloe Kardashian's old clothes sell out almost immediately
text:
Khloe Kardahsian is selling her old clothes on the new Kardashian family site Kardashian Kloset.

And her old togs seem to be a hit as the items sold out almost immediately.

But her sister Kim Kardashian, who put her clothes in the site two weeks ago, is still struggling to unload dresses from Balmian and Givenchy, most likely because the prices are high.

Beloved: Khloe Kardahsian is selling her old clothes on the new Kardashian familysite Kardashian Kloset. And her old togs seem to be a hit as the items sold out almost immediately

Khloe's hit items were a leopard print blouse from Charolette Olympia for $300, an IRO blouse for $150 and a Realisation Par dress for $125.

As for Kim, she has listed a Robert Cavalli mini dress in a size four for $3,5000 but there are no takers.

Shipping is $13.95.

Also sitting around is a Givenchy blouse for $700.

All sales are final. No returns, exchanges, refunds or cancellations.

They like her look: This dress by Mugler sold for $700; it's a size six

The site is a 'luxury resale e-commerce platform that lists pre-owned items from the Kardashian-Jenner's wardrobes,' according to a statement from their publicity firm shared two weeks ago.

'For the first time you’ll be able to shop items directly from the Kardashian and Jenner family closets,' the site added.

The items include clothing, shoes and handbags worn by all of Kris Jenner's daughters including Kourtney, 40, Kim, 38, Khloe, 35, Kendall, 23, and Kylie, 22.

For sale: The Kardashian family is launching Kardashian Kloset on Friday morning. It is a 'luxury resale e-commerce platform that lists pre-owned items from the Kardashian-Jenner's wardrobes,' according to a statement from their publicity firm; seen in May

Momager Kris Jenner, who favors Chanel and Balmain, is also selling her wares.

'The first drop will feature items belonging to Kris Jenner, Kim Kardashian West, and Kylie Jenner ranging from $20-$9,000,' the statement added.

'Clothing and accessories from Kourtney Kardashian, Khloe Kardashian, and Kendall Jenner's closets will follow in weekly drops.'

The web site is KardashianKloset.com and the items are from Chanel, Louis Vuitton, Balmain, Tom Ford, Versace, Bottega Veneta and Roberto Cavalli, to name a few.

The site pushed their mission for 'sustainability': 'Our goal at Kardashian Kloset is to share a part of the Kardashian Jenner family lifestyle by offering you the opportunity to own one of a kind items, while promoting sustainability.'

They are all doing it: 'The first drop will feature items belonging to Kris Jenner, Kim Kardashian West, and Kylie Jenner ranging from $20-$9,000,' the statement added. 'Clothing and accessories from Kourtney Kardashian, Khloe Kardashian, and Kendall Jenner's closets will follow in weekly drops'; seen on the new CR cover

Kim's closet is full of big name items. The mother-of-four often wears Balmain, Thierry Mugler and Versace.

But once upon a time it was not all rosy for the friend of Paris Hilton.

When Kim came to fame over 10 years ago with Keeping Up With The Kardashians she used to wear clothing off the racks from stores like Barneys New York.

She had a certain look and it was more suburban mall than 5th Avenue.

Givenchy designer Riccardo Tisci told Details magazine in 2015, 'Kim wasn't always accepted in the fashion community. By nobody. And she's a sweet girl.

He said that her husband Kanye West helped craft her new look.

He added: 'In the beginning, I met her because of my respect for Kanye, and then I liked her a lot and we became friends. I got killed because of this. But I didn't care. That is a friend, you see.

So casual: These days Kim has been plugging her new cotton SKIMS collection

'And this is why, when they got married, they asked me to dress them. They say, "You've always been with us. You've been a real friend." If I like somebody, I like somebody. If I don't like somebody, I don't like somebody.'

Kylie - who announced this week she has split from Travis Scott - has been a style goddess ever since she plumped up her lips and became rich from her Lip Kits.

The mother to Stormi often wears Balenciaga and Dior.

Kendall, a fashion plate, wears plenty of couture from Calvin Klein and Prada.

Kourtney copies Kim, if the latest episode of KUWTK where Kim accused Kourtney of taking from designers she has befriended, is accurate.

Khloe used to dress in cute party clothes. Now she tends to dress is body-hugging sportswear and often plugs her own brand, Good American, which is size inclusive.

The family used to sell their old items on an ebay store and give 10% of the profits to charity. They also had several DASH clothing stores.
description: Khloe Kardahsian is selling her old clothes on the new Kardashian family site Kardashian Kloset. And her old togs seem to be a hit as the items sold out almost immediately.
